name: SYPHR: Enter The Dungeon
description:
CONTROLS

Arrow keys to move. X for light attacks,  Z for heavy attacks. 

OR

WASD controls. J for light attacks, K for heavy attacks.

OR

Use touch controls on your mobile device!

The rest is pretty self explanatory.  Can you get to the end? Post how many Bytes you got in the comments below!

Use this link if mobile controls don't work smoothly:

https://s3-eu-west-1.amazonaws.com/gd-games/game-8b2f1a74-9ecb-4b39-b420-4d7f641...
